seo.title: About Us - Building Autonomous Marketing | Future Marketing AI
seo.description: We're building the autonomous marketing platform of the future with 3 founding teams. Launching Q1 2026. Powered by GPT-4, Claude, Gemini, and Perplexity.

hero.title: About Future Marketing AI
hero.tagline: Building the autonomous marketing system of the future

mission.heading: Our Mission
mission.text: To democratize enterprise-grade AI marketing automation for ambitious businesses. We believe every company should have access to the same intelligent marketing capabilities as Fortune 500 companies‚Äîwithout the Fortune 500 budget.
mission.why_text: We built this platform for ourselves first. As operators running our own marketing, we were frustrated by fragmented tools, manual workflows, and the inability to scale without hiring. So we built the system we wished existed.

assisted.title: AI-Assisted Marketing Era
assisted.description: ChatGPT and similar tools help marketers work faster, but still require significant manual oversight and coordination.

autonomous.title: Autonomous Marketing Era
autonomous.description: Complete AI systems that handle the entire workflow autonomously. This is where we are‚Äîand where early adopters gain a 3-5 year competitive advantage.

standard.title: Standard Practice
standard.description: Autonomous marketing becomes the norm. By then, early movers have built an insurmountable lead through compounding AI learning effects.

key_message.title: Early adopters gain a 3-5 year competitive advantage
key_message.description: Just like early Salesforce adopters in 2004 or early AI tool users in 2020‚Äîbeing first compounds over time.

cta.title: Join the Founding Teams
cta.description: We're building this in partnership with 3 forward-thinking businesses. 7 founding slots remain.
